basics.name: Viktor Ohád
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am a full stack developer who can build apps from the ground up. I am a very product focused developer who priotizes user feedback first and foremost. I am generally very flexible when investigating new roles.

work.name: Instructure
work.summary:
Instructure is the maker of Canvas lms. I was working on the design-system/component library, which is an open-source React based project which aims to help engineers developing accessible and relible user interfaces while providing the Canvas look and feel.
Used technologies: React, Webpack, ESBuild, TypeScript, GitHub Actions
highlights: Was heavily involved of the JavaScript to TypeScript migration of a pretty big React based project
Made the build/bootstrap process of the same project faster by 2x
Layed down the foundations of a new Web-component based design system/component library
Made the release process more reliable by simplifying it
Moved the project from an internal Jenkins CI environment to an open-source GitHub Action based one

work.name: Danubius Informatika
work.summary:
I was working on a team which was building a learning and teaching platform for Belgian schools. I started here as a Frontend developer, but I was interseted in the whole stack of development so eventually I transitioned to write end to end features as well. 
 Used technologies: React, Webpack, TypeScript, C#, Azure DevOps, MSSQL

work.name: Lufthansa Systems Hungária
work.summary: Used technologies: Ext.js, React, Node.js, TypeScript
